criticalSuccess: You plant your feet and drive forward with explosive power, slamming both palms into {targetName}'s chest. The impact is devastating - they fly backward several feet, arms windmilling desperately as they struggle to stay upright. They barely manage to keep from falling, but they're now far out of position!

With perfect technique and overwhelming strength, you barrel into {targetName}. Your shoulder hits them square in the torso and they're launched backward like they were hit by a charging bull. They stumble back multiple steps, totally disrupted!

You execute a powerful two-handed shove that catches {targetName} completely unprepared. The force sends them reeling backward, feet scrambling to keep up with their momentum. By the time they regain balance, you've created significant distance!
success: You push hard against {targetName}, managing to force them back a few feet. They resist, but your strength prevails and they give ground reluctantly.
Your shove connects solidly with {targetName}. They stumble backward a step or two, enough to create the space you needed.
You successfully drive {targetName} backward with a firm push. It's not spectacular, but it works - they're now at a distance.

Your shove meets solid resistance. {targetName} braces against your push and holds their ground completely.
You try to force {targetName} backward, but they're simply too solid. Your push accomplishes nothing.
criticalFailure: You commit fully to shoving {targetName}, but they read it perfectly and sidestep. Your momentum carries you forward, stumbling, nearly falling. You end up more off-balance than they are!
Your overeager shove is poorly timed and executed. {targetName} braces at just the right moment, and when they don't move, you stumble forward awkwardly, completely exposed!
You push with too much force and not enough control. {targetName} simply isn't where you thought they'd be, and you lurch forward, arms extended, barely keeping your feet!

criticalSuccess: You explode forward with devastating power, every muscle in your body contributing to the shove. Your hands slam into {targetName} like battering rams, and the laws of physics take over. They're not just pushed - they're launched. Their feet leave the ground for a split second as they fly backward, then they crash down several feet away, stumbling desperately to stay upright. The sheer force of your push has completely disrupted their position and balance. They're reeling, disoriented, utterly dominated by your raw power!

With the precision of a master wrestler and the force of a charging bull, you drive into {targetName}. It's not just a push - it's controlled violence. Your shoulder connects with perfect placement, your legs drive with explosive power, and {targetName} has no choice but to yield. They fly backward, arms flailing, feet scrambling for purchase on ground that seems to slip away beneath them. By the time they regain any semblance of control, you've created a gulf between you!
success: You plant your feet and shove hard against {targetName}. They resist, digging in, but your strength is greater. Step by reluctant step, you drive them backward until you've created the distance you need. It's not pretty, but it's effective.
Your push connects solidly with {targetName}. The force isn't overwhelming, but it's enough. They stumble back a few feet, off-balance for a moment, giving you the tactical advantage.
failure: You push against {targetName} with determined strength, but they've anticipated it. Their stance is perfect, their center of gravity low and stable. Despite your best effort, they don't move. Your hands press against them, muscles straining, but you might as well be pushing a wall.
Your shove meets immovable resistance. {targetName} has planted themselves so solidly that your push accomplishes nothing except demonstrating their superior positioning. Frustrating.
criticalFailure: In your aggressive attempt to shove {targetName}, you telegraph your intention so obviously that they're ready for it. As you commit to the push, they simply step aside with casual ease. Your momentum, with nothing to stop it, carries you stumbling forward. You have to scramble to regain your footing, and in that moment of vulnerability, you're completely exposed to counterattack!

You throw yourself into the shove with reckless abandon, all power and no technique. {targetName} reads it like a book. They brace at the perfect moment, and when your push connects with their immovable stance, it's you who stumbles. The impact of hitting their solid resistance throws you off-balance. You reel backward, arms pinwheeling, looking foolish while they stand firm and untroubled!
